So when the radio is doing the sweep, is it important to have a random  
sw=
eep or a linear? Does one work better than the other? Also is it important =
to 
 be able to very the speed of the sweep?
 
Dwayne Claud
 
 
In a messag=
e dated 5/18/2010 12:34:05 P.M. Pacific Daylight Time,  
purplealiengirl@gm=
ail.com writes:

 
 
 
They do hear, but as far I know, not through the  bo=
x---but--they do seem 
to indicate the box transmits something, maybe a  qu=
antum signal--whatever 
that is. You don't even have to have to sound comin=
g  out to get good 
recordings, like connecting the recorder via the headph=
one  jack. 
 
 F-S


On Mon, May 17, 2010 at 6:33 PM, trilobitegal 
<_flexi=
calymenemeeki@flexicalymefle_ (mailto:flexicalymenemeeki@...) > =
 wrote:


 
 
 
Oh, I think I understand this now. You don't speak to the b=
ox much,  right? 
So, they don't really have to hear you?  


--- In _EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) , Frank 
Sumption  <pu=
rplealiengirl@pur> wrote:
>

> I use a line output to the recorder. A mic i=
nside the  chamber picks up 
the
> sounds, then it's amplified inside the b=
ox and  fed to the oputput jack 
and
> monitor speaker.
> 
>  F-S
> 
> On M=
on, May 17, 2010 at 8:40 AM, trilobitegal  <

> flexicalymenemeeki@ fl> wro=
te:
>

Thanks!

<EVP-ITC%_40yahoogroups.40y_ (http://40yahoogr=
oups.com/) >, Frank Sumption  
 


> > <purplealiengirl@> wrote:
> >  >
> >=
 > No, the echo chamber is not needed, but it does seem  to add 
something,=
 or
> > > allow some other levels access. For  the past couple years I've b=
een 
using
> > > mostly what I call  direct mode, or no echo chamber. When =
I use an
> > aluminum
>  > > foil chamber I seem to get more ET types, and =
that's what I used  to 
get
> > "we
> > > come from the 6th planet" years  =
ago.
> > >
> > > A very large echo chamber can have  a dramatic effect, lik=
e 12 inches
> > > square, and 4 feet long.  I made one that size out of MDF=
 board and 
lined
> > it
> >  > wiht aluminum foil, the voices were so demo=
nic sounding that I took  
it
> > > apart. Later I found that if something =
works, you tend  to get the
> > negative
> > > guys to try to scare you  aw=
ay from it.
> > >
> > > F-S
